title: Pixel Xl4 not emitting sound for reminders
content:
If I use the google assistant to set a reminder ("Okay google, remind me in five minutes to bake a cake"), I get a visual notification but no sound, even though sounds are enabled under the Google app for both "reminders", "task reminders" and "hand off".

I hate to reset phone to factory to see if that fixes it.  I've also tried all the troubleshooting tips I've found on the web.

Too bad the Google app itself doesn't have the ability to "fix" common problems like this -- google must know what settings are required (ie in possibly various places) in order to achieve things like emitting sounds -..
